text: Iryanthera campinae is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is endemic to Brazil. ==References== * Rodrigues, W.A. 1998. Iryanthera campinae. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. title: Iryanthera campinae
